title: april 14: iceberg right ahead [hosted by: dodie]
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, guest host dodie talks about the luxury liner Titanic hitting an iceberg and sinking in 1912. After, she remembers Beyonce’s groundbreaking performance at Coachella. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
